meanings.definition: A type of plant with a single main stem or trunk.
meanings.sent1: The monopodia in the garden stood tall and proud.
meanings.sent2: The monopodia of the tree reached towards the sky.
meanings.sent3: The monopodia in the forest liked to show off their height.
meanings.sent4: The monopodia of the plant was like a tower in the green sea of leaves.
meanings.sent5: The monopodia's single stem made it easy to spot among the bushes.

meanings.definition: A type of furniture with a single leg or support.
meanings.sent1: The antique table had a monopodia that gave it a unique look.
meanings.sent2: The monopodia of the chair made it wobble slightly.
meanings.sent3: The monopodia of the stool always seemed to be dancing.
meanings.sent4: The monopodia of the desk was like a lone soldier holding up the weight.
meanings.sent5: The monopodia's single leg made it stand out among the other furniture.
